page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content:
OUR BLOCK IS MAINLY RURAL AND RESIDENTIAL ENCROACHMENT WITH RELICS OF THE INDUSTRIAL AND AGRARIAN REVOLUTIONS AND OF THE IRON AGE.
THE TOPOGRAPHY OF THE AREA IS HILLY WITH SOME CONIFEROUS FOREST AND BROAD LEAVED WOODLAND, MOORLAND, MIXED HILL FARMING,MAINLY SHEEP AND DAIRY, SMALL VILLAGES AND HAMLETS AND THE EDGE OF CWMBRAN NEWTOWN CORPORATION HOUSING ESTATES WITH SOME PRIVATE DEVELOPMENT. THE IRON AGE FORTRESS OF TWM BARLLWM AT THE END OF THE MYNYDD HENLLYS RIDGE IN THE S.W.CORNER HAS VIEWS OVER THE ENTIRE AREA; TO THE AFON LLWYD VALLEY TO THE EAST; THE ESTUARIES OF THE USK AND THE EBBW, NEWPORT AND THE BRITISH CHANNEL, SOMERSET TO THE SOUTH EAST; RISCA, CWMCARN AND THE WESTERN VALLEYS.
